search_story_30/6601_1201_0100_10:
Guten Morgen, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
It’s finally your big day!
search_story_30/6601_1201_0200_10:
It was such a wonderful surprise to hear
that you’re in the finals!
search_story_30/6601_1201_0300_10:
I should have expected it, though. You’ve made
it this far because you worked together with your
team members and Pokémon.
search_story_30/6601_1201_0400_10:
I think now, you could make your sync stone shine
brighter than anyone else’s!
search_story_30/6601_1201_0500_10: I’ll be rooting for you at the finals! Boa sorte!
search_story_30/6601_0401_0700_10: Don’t hold back! Show them everything you’ve got!
search_story_30/6601_0402_0900_10: Of course! I’m sure it’ll be a match to remember!
search_story_30/6601_1201_1000_10:
Now, why don’t you go and talk to your
teammates for a bit before your big match?
search_story_30/6601_1201_1100_10:
I think they’ll feel extra pumped up after a
pep talk from you!
search_story_30/6602_1001_0200_10:
I never thought we’d be battling you in
the finals.
search_story_30/6602_1001_0300_10:
Well, I did! I knew you and your team could
do it, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
search_story_30/6602_1001_0600_10: Oh, looks like he’s already in battle mode.
search_story_30/6602_1001_0700_10:
Red never wavers when it comes to his love of
battling, does he.
search_story_30/6602_1001_0800_10:
I mean, we ARE talking about the guy who
wanted to focus on battling so much that he
holed himself up in Mt. Silver!
search_story_30/6602_1001_0900_10: All right! Time to get this battle start—
search_story_30/6602_1001_1200_10:
I’M going to signal the start of the finals!
That’s MY responsibility as the host of
this competition!
search_story_30/6602_1001_1300_10:
Furthermore, I’ll also be the referee of this match!
You should all be grateful!
search_story_30/6602_1001_1500_10: I suppose that’s enough for my usual entrance.
search_story_30/6602_1001_1600_10:
Ahem. The team that wins this match will be
the first champions of the PML!
search_story_30/6602_1001_1700_10:
This battle will go down in the history of Pasio
and be spoken of for generations to come!
search_story_30/6602_1001_1800_10:
Treasure the bonds you’ve built with your partner
Pokémon and teammates, and hold your heads
up high with pride!
search_story_30/6602_1001_1900_10:
Sync pairs of Pasio! Show us the finest battle
we’ve ever seen!
search_story_30/6602_1001_2000_10: All right! It’s time for our final challenge!
search_story_30/6602_0401_2300_10:
Let’s fight our hearts out and totally win it all!
Our team’s gonna win this championship!
search_story_30/6602_0402_2500_10:
Yeah! Let’s give it our best shot and fight it out
to the very end!
search_story_30/6602_1001_2600_10:
Ladies and gentlemen! Get ready for the
championship match of the Pokémon
Masters League...
